faqs.question: What is the warranty for this product?
faqs.answer: Our product comes with a 1-year limited warranty. Please refer to the warranty information provided with the product for more details.

faqs.question: How can I track my order?
faqs.answer: Once your order is shipped, you will receive a tracking number via email. You can use this tracking number to monitor the status of your shipment.

faqs.question: Can I return the product if I am not satisfied?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day return policy. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you can return the product within 30 days for a full refund, minus the shipping fees.

faqs.question: Is this product available for international shipping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer international shipping. Shipping costs and delivery times may vary depending on the destination. Please check our shipping information for more details.

faqs.question: How do I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can contact our customer support team by emailing support@example.com or by calling our toll-free number at 1-800-123-4567. Our support team is available Monday to Friday, 9 am to 5 pm.
